Class Issue

  • java.lang.Object
    • Issue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Issue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data-oriented class. Issues contain Journal Articles, and are contained within Volumes.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
